select distinct p.permission_name,p.role_descr from test.f_user_account u left join test.f_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join test.f_role r on ur.role_id = r.id left join test.f_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = r.id left join test.f_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id where account = 'tpad1d12' and p.permission_name like concat('createUser','%')

select distinct p.permission_name,p.role_descr from test.f_user_account u left join test.f_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join test.f_role r on ur.role_id = r.id left join test.f_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = r.id left join test.f_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id where account = #{account} and p.permission_name like concat('viewRP','%')

select distinct p.permission_name,p.descr from (select * from test.f_role where id=#{rid}) r left join test.f_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = r.id left join test.f_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id
